description: Dispatched when an entity has successfully moved from one location to another. This event triggers follower movement.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the payload for the 'core:entity_moved' event.

entityId.description: The ID of the entity that moved.

previousLocationId.description: The ID of the location the entity was in before the move.

currentLocationId.description: The ID of the location the entity is now in after the move.

movement_type.description: The type of movement. 'natural' for player-initiated moves, 'teleport' for system-initiated moves like followers.

originalCommand.description: The original command string that initiated the move.
